name: Cattabunga! Demo
description: Cattabunga! is a 2d platformer played as a cat. The main goal is to get to the house on each level. The instructions on how to play are in the main menu in the game. Made by JEMCraftStudios. Music by Jacob Meyers (Team JEM). Full version coming soon. Resolution on display may not be accurrate on some laptops or monitors.
